testcase.name: To validate that redirection occurs to the Sign In page if the customer is not registered
testcase.system-out: Given UniversalClass website is ready.......................................passed When I launch URL in chrome browser.........................................passed Then Home page of UniversalClasses website should open......................passed And I should see My Classes button..........................................passed When I click on My Classes button...........................................passed Then Sign In page should be displayed.......................................passed

testcase.name: To validate that the joined courses is displayed if the customer is a member of the Universal Class
testcase.system-out: Given UniversalClass website is ready.......................................passed When I launch URL in chrome browser.........................................passed Then Home page of UniversalClasses website should open......................passed When I click on the Hamburger icon..........................................passed Then Sign In option should be visible.......................................passed When I click on the Sign In option..........................................passed Then Sign In page should be displayed.......................................passed When I enter valid email as <"dipanwita.jash@gmail.com"> in Sign In page....passed And I enter valid password as <"Dipa1234$"> in Sign In page.................passed And I click on Sign In button...............................................passed Then I wait.................................................................passed When I click on the Sign In option..........................................passed When I enter valid email as <"dipanwita.jash@gmail.com"> in Sign In page....passed And I enter valid password as <"Dipa1234$"> in Sign In page.................passed And I click on Sign In button...............................................passed Then I get logged in to our respective profiles.............................passed And joined courses should be displayed......................................passed
